about.page_description: Meet the team behind Be-Found — 30+ years of search expertise, now pioneering AI visibility and Generative Engine Optimization.
about.mission_p1: We help businesses become visible and cited in AI-powered search engines. As AI transforms how people find information, traditional SEO alone is no longer enough.
about.mission_p2: Be-Found combines three decades of search expertise with cutting-edge GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) strategies to ensure your business is found by both humans and AI.
about.dries_bio: With 30+ years in search — from the early days of AltaVista to today's AI-powered engines — Dries has been at the forefront of every major shift in search technology. He founded Be-Found to help businesses navigate the transition to AI-driven discovery.
about.dries_credentials: GEO pioneer since 2023 · Search veteran since 1996 · Founder of Bloffee & GEO-Score
about.joost_bio: Joost coordinates Be-Found's AI visibility projects across 45 countries, ensuring every client engagement delivers measurable results. His systematic approach keeps complex multi-market strategies on track.
about.story_p1: Be-Found started in 1996 when Dries de Gelder began helping businesses get found on the early web. Through decades of search evolution — from directories to PageRank to mobile-first — the mission stayed the same: make sure you're found.
about.story_p2: In 2023, as ChatGPT and AI Overviews began reshaping search, Dries recognized that businesses needed a fundamentally new approach. That's when Be-Found pivoted to become the authority hub for Generative Engine Optimization (GEO).
about.story_p3: Today, Be-Found operates the Bloffee AI content platform and GEO-Score analysis tool, serving clients in 45 countries who want to be found — and cited — by every AI.
about.value_data_description: Every recommendation is backed by original research and measurable metrics.
about.value_transparent_description: We openly share our methodology, AI usage, and editorial process.
about.value_results_description: We measure success in citations, visibility scores, and real business impact.
about.cta_description: Let's discuss how we can improve your AI visibility.

services.faq_subtitle: Common questions about our GEO services.
services.faq_1_q: What is GEO and how does it differ from SEO?
services.faq_1_a: GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) focuses on making your content visible and citable in AI-powered search engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google AI Overviews. While SEO targets traditional search rankings, GEO ensures AI systems recognize and reference your expertise.
services.faq_2_q: How long does it take to see results?
services.faq_2_a: Most clients see measurable improvements in AI visibility within 4–8 weeks. Citation tracking begins immediately, and you'll receive regular progress reports with concrete metrics.
services.faq_3_q: Do I still need traditional SEO?
services.faq_3_a: Yes — SEO and GEO complement each other. Strong technical SEO provides the foundation that AI systems need to discover and index your content. We integrate both approaches in our strategy.
services.faq_4_q: What industries do you work with?
services.faq_4_a: We work with B2B companies, SaaS platforms, professional services, and e-commerce businesses across 45 countries. Any business that wants to be found by AI can benefit from GEO.

pricing.faq_1_a: Each tier builds on the previous one. Strategic Insight gives you the baseline and roadmap. Growth Acceleration adds active implementation. Boardroom Advisory includes C-level strategic partnership.
pricing.faq_2_a: No long-term contracts. We work on a monthly basis. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel at any time with 30 days notice.
pricing.faq_3_q: Do you offer annual billing discounts?
pricing.faq_3_a: Yes — annual billing saves approximately 15-20% compared to monthly. Contact us for exact annual pricing.

faq.page_description: Everything you need to know about GEO, AI visibility, and our services.
faq.geo_1_a: GEO is the practice of optimizing your content and online presence to be visible, referenced, and cited in AI-powered search engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI Overviews, and Claude. It goes beyond traditional SEO by ensuring AI systems recognize your expertise.
faq.geo_2_q: How is GEO different from traditional SEO?
faq.geo_2_a: Traditional SEO focuses on ranking in search results. GEO focuses on being cited in AI-generated answers. While SEO targets keywords and backlinks, GEO targets E-E-A-T signals, citation-worthy content, and structured data that AI systems can understand and reference.
faq.geo_3_q: Why do I need GEO if I'm already ranking well in Google?
faq.geo_3_a: 58% of Google searches now end without a click, thanks to AI Overviews. Even if you rank #1, users may get their answer from AI without visiting your site. GEO ensures you're the source being cited in those AI answers.
faq.services_1_q: What's included in a GEO audit?
faq.services_1_a: A full analysis of your AI visibility across major platforms (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI Overviews), your current GEO score, content citation potential, Schema.org implementation, E-E-A-T signals, and a prioritized roadmap for improvement.
faq.services_2_q: How long does a typical engagement last?
faq.services_2_a: Most clients see meaningful results within 3-6 months. We recommend a minimum 3-month engagement to establish baseline metrics, implement changes, and measure impact. Many clients continue on a retainer basis after the initial period.
faq.services_3_q: Do you work with businesses outside Europe?
faq.services_3_a: Yes — we serve clients in 45 countries. GEO is a global discipline, and our strategies work across markets and languages. We support content in 6 languages: English, Dutch, German, French, Spanish, and Portuguese.
faq.tools_1_q: What is GEO-Score and how does it work?
faq.tools_1_a: GEO-Score is our AI visibility analysis tool that measures how well your website is cited and referenced by AI-powered search engines. It analyzes content structure, E-E-A-T signals, schema markup, and citation frequency to give you a score from 0-100.
faq.tools_2_a: Bloffee is our AI blog automation platform that creates GEO-optimized content. It generates articles structured specifically to be cited by AI systems, supporting 6 languages and automated publishing workflows.
faq.engagement_1_q: What happens after our engagement ends?
faq.engagement_1_a: You keep everything we build — all content, optimizations, and strategies are yours. We provide a transition document with recommendations for maintaining and building on the work. Many clients choose to continue with a lighter retainer for ongoing monitoring.
faq.engagement_2_q: Can I start with a smaller engagement and scale up?
faq.engagement_2_a: Absolutely. We recommend starting with a GEO audit (included in Strategic Insight) to understand your current position. From there, you can scale up to Growth Acceleration or Boardroom Advisory based on your needs and results.

legal.privacy_intro: Be-Found ("we", "us", "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights.
legal.privacy_no_cookies: The good news: this site uses no tracking cookies and no third-party trackers.
legal.privacy_collect_contact: Contact form submissions: your name, email, company name, and message. Used only to respond to your inquiry. Deleted after 30 days.
legal.privacy_collect_analytics: Anonymous analytics via Plausible Analytics: page views, referrers, country. No cookies, no personal data, no IP addresses stored.
legal.privacy_collect_functional: Language preference: stored in your browser (localStorage), not sent to our servers.
legal.privacy_use_p1: We use your data only to respond to your inquiries and to understand aggregate site traffic. We never sell, share, or trade personal data with third parties.
legal.privacy_rights_p1: Under EU/EEA data protection law, you have the right to access, correct, delete, or export your personal data. You can also object to processing at any time.
legal.privacy_rights_p2: To exercise any of these rights, email us at privacy@be-found.online.
legal.privacy_retention_p1: Contact form data: 30 days. Analytics data: aggregated only (no personal data to retain). Server logs: 30 days (Railway hosting).
legal.privacy_security_p1: All data is transmitted over encrypted connections (TLS/SSL). We use minimal data collection by design — less data stored means less risk.
legal.privacy_changes_p1: We may update this policy. Material changes will be noted at the top of this page with the updated effective date.
legal.terms_intro: These terms govern your use of be-found.online. By using this site, you agree to these terms.
legal.terms_use_p1: You may access and use this site for lawful purposes. You may not scrape, mirror, or use automated tools to access this site without permission.
legal.terms_content_p1: All content on this site is owned by Be-Found unless otherwise noted. Our research and statistics are shared under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 (CC BY 4.0) — you may share and reference them with attribution.
legal.terms_content_p2: To cite our research: include the article title, "Be-Found.online" as the source, and a link to the original page.
legal.terms_disclaimer_p1: This site provides information about GEO and AI visibility. It is not legal, financial, or technical advice. Results vary by business — past performance does not guarantee future results.
legal.terms_liability_p1: Be-Found is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of this site or our services.
legal.terms_law_p1: These terms are governed by the laws of the Netherlands. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of the Netherlands.
legal.terms_changes_p1: We may update these terms. Continued use of the site after changes constitutes acceptance.
legal.cookies_intro: We respect your privacy. This site uses no tracking cookies.
legal.cookies_what_p1: This site does not set any tracking cookies. We use Plausible Analytics, which is fully cookieless — no personal data is collected or stored.
legal.cookies_functional_p1: Your language and theme preferences are stored in your browser's localStorage. This is not a cookie — it stays on your device and is never sent to our servers.
